name: navidrome
description: Navidrome is a modern, self-hosted music streaming server and API compatible with Subsonic. It provides fast search, mobile clients, playlists, and a clean responsive interface for personal music libraries.
features: Subsonic API compatibility: Works with dozens of mobile and desktop music clients across all platforms.
Fast library scanning: Efficiently indexes large music collections with metadata extraction and cover art.
Smart playlists: Create dynamic playlists based on criteria like genre, year, or play count.
Multi-user support: Separate libraries and preferences for different users with access controls.
Transcoding: On-the-fly audio conversion for bandwidth optimization and device compatibility.
Last.fm scrobbling: Track listening history and sync play counts to Last.fm for music discovery.
Responsive web player: Modern browser-based interface with queue management and playback controls.
Album art management: Automatic cover art fetching with manual override options.
Search and filtering: Quick navigation through artists, albums, and tracks with advanced filters.
Favorites and ratings: Mark favorite tracks and rate music for personalized recommendations.
Low resource usage: Efficient Go-based server runs smoothly on minimal hardware.
Offline mode: Download tracks to mobile clients for listening without internet connection.
